name: Mancala AR
description:
Traditional board game, with AR supported.

Don't have a real mancala board game? Don't worry.

Mancala AR turns your device into a mancala simulator, just scan for a surface like a table and "put" the board game on it.

You can either play with AI, or share your device with your friend and play the game together!

Main functions:
Mancala board game with AR engine
Simple versus AI mode
Single device two players
Toggle AR Mode

Advertisement enabled in this game, you can pay to remove ads, or accept our privacy policy https://tamkc.web.fc2.com/unityprivacy.html (In Japanese) and Unity's privacy policy https://unity3d.com/legal/privacy-policy
